review: A great toy! I can now stream Netflix and Youtube content directly to my TV. No longer do I have to rely on a cable to connect my laptop to my TV. That said; it dos not work correctly on all streaming sites. But Google is working on it. The option to mirror your laptop screen is still in BETA and a bit laggy. One serious letdown, is it's inability to transmit in 1080p, you are stuck with the high-end of 720p at best.All in all a great stocking stuffer for the geek in your life.PS. it comes with a USB cable which can be used to power the device if your TV has one and an HDMI extender for those TV's with hard to reach ports!Update: it's ability to mirror your laptops' screen is NOT compatible with Windows 8. When you switch to the "Tiles" mode nothing happens. Also bear in mind that for most, the "mirror" option, only works for the Google Chrome Tabs.
author: J. Suarez

review: Simplicity and affordability make this a 5 star item.  I can watch netflix on my ipad but sometimes I want to watch it on tv and I don't want to hassle with the setup required to do that.  This device takes care of everything.  I downloaded the app on my ipad (works with a smartphone too).  Plugged the chromecast into the hdmi port of my tv.  Synced the ipad and chromecast, then immediately started watching shows on my tv.  My son likes using it to turn a 27" tv into a second monitor for his chromebook without having to deal with wires.  As long as your wireless connection is strong enough to stream on your ipad or phone, the video stream will be smooth on your tv.  The simplicity is what makes this ingenious.
